About.Title: About Radio Player
About.Description:
Radio Player is a modern, open-source desktop application for streaming internet radio stations. Built with cutting-edge .NET 10 and WPF technologies, it provides seamless access to over 51,000 radio stations from around the world.

Featuring a beautiful Material Design interface, intelligent buffering, and multi-format audio support (MP3, AAC, OGG Vorbis), Radio Player delivers a premium listening experience with features like favorites management, playback history tracking, and system tray integration.

Features.Access: Access to 51,000+ internet radio stations worldwide
Features.Search: Advanced search by name, country, language, and genre
Features.Streaming: Multi-format streaming: MP3, AAC, OGG Vorbis
Features.Favorites: Save and organize your favorite stations
Features.History: Track listening history with duration statistics
Features.SystemTray: Minimize to system tray for background playback

About.TechnologyDescription: Built with .NET 10 and WPF for Windows desktop. Powered by NAudio for high-quality audio streaming, MaterialDesignThemes for stunning UI, and the Radio Browser API for access to thousands of stations.
